title: Is my cpu/gpu not good enough?
body:
hi
im currently at 10-20 fps in game and i wanted to know if it was caused by my cpu/gpu and if yes wich ones should i buy? (socket type s1)
Here are my comp stats

replies.body: I couldn't really tell you what do do for your specific case, but I can recommend bookmarking our[ recommended specs ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements)guide.  Take a look over, and use it to make a decision best fit for you.  I hope that helps!

You are in definite need of an upgrade my man, CPU/GPU/Ram and even storage are the most important things. SSD's load games way faster than any hard drive will. 

I would definitely suggest upgrading to an i3 or maybe even an i5 processor, and definitely try to find a good budget Nvidia card. AMD sucks, and iv'e had BOTH AMD and NVIDIA, and i still rock NVIDIA today. AMD runs hot, is power hungry, and has less life span in MY experience. So, go team GREEN! BOO TEAM RED! Also you want 8GB of Ram at least, though 16GB is definitely the sweet spot. Anything more than that is for heavy editing and such. Also it is better to have it in pairs instead of having just 1. So, 2 8GB sticks is better than 1 16 GB stick.

Here's my build (which is totally overkill for a game like League)
Motherboard- Z170 Pro Gaming DDR4
GPU- EVGA Geforce GTX 980 Ti SSC
CPU- I7- 6700k skylake 4.0 ghz OC'd to 4.9.
Ram- Corsair Vengeance DDR4 high speed ram (16GB)( 2x 8GB stick kit)
Storage- Samsung 1 TB SSD, and a 2 TB hard drive
Power Supply- 1000 Watt plat certified evga

It ran me $1900 at the time of build ( about 1- 1/2 years ago).

Make sure when you upgrade that you make sure your motherboard is compatible with what you want to buy. You can't stick DDR4 ram into a DDR3 Motherboard, it won't even see it, or it will cause crashes and errors if it does.

But i definitely suggest you upgrade if you want more frames. CPU and GPU are definitely the most important, along side with RAM. And an SSD for your games will never hurt either.
